snippet.title: Rustler gameplay: Outrageous Medieval GTA Parody! | ALPHA SOUP
snippet.description:
Steal horses and get chased by medievel police in this funny parody of GTA! Check out Rustler gameplay from the closed alpha here.
► Enjoy this? Support me on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/randomiseuser
► Buy me a coffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/randomiseuser
► Subscribe here! http://bit.ly/RandomiseUser
► Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/QJkaaeE

More of the best indie games from Randomise User! In this let's play Rustler gameplay review we jump into the closed alpha of a game that's beaten its Kickstarter target. Rustler gameplay plays like the original top-down GTA games, with side quests, police chases, story and dangerous streets, but it's set in medieval times.

Wishlist/Buy game download on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/844260/Rustler_Grand_Theft_Horse/

Developed by: Jutsu Games
Version played: alpha 
Rustler release date: TBA
Formats available: PC Windows, Mac

More related videos: #RandomiseUser #IndieGames #Rustler

Thanks for watching this let's play Rustler gameplay review! More from Randomise User, home of the best indie games:
► Let's play indie games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1fnvqfQI4mhyXJu5Y7hcS5vC
► Alpha Soup early first looks: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1flWq5KRBP8GhUqcGxJT5cPB

Review key received for free to allow us to make this video.
